title: Agatha Falls: The Freya Barrett Mysteries
description: Don't let the picture post card fool you. Agatha Falls, Connecticut is a town full of secrets. Newspaper reporter, Freya Barrett is out to expose them all , even if it puts her in danger. The North Woods Strangler has struck, killing a local teen and Freya is determined to find her killer. Sex, greed, corruption and murder, are no stranger to Agatha Falls. This is book one of the new series, The Freya Barrett Mysteries.
author: Lisa Mancini
